citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:28 am on
17-Sep-18.
Upon arrival at the facility knocked on the door and rang the doorbell. Made phone calls and left messages.
Departed facility at 12:00 pm.
